metadata.title: The Jewelry Source 8MM Titanium Ring Rainbow Band, Titanium Bands for Women
description: This stunning 8 mm titanium ring has six 3 mm square gems that are the color of the rainbow. With an all polish finish, you are sure to love it!! Available in sizes 8-12 in whole size increments.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "SKU#R30523-RP-Size10", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "August 25, 2011", "Manufacturer": "The Jewelry Source"}
